stripped_text: You cannot use this resource more than once per turn. click: Choose a card type. Reveal the top card of your stack. If that card has the chosen type, draw it and gain 2[credit]. Otherwise, trash it.
text: You cannot use this resource more than once per turn. [click]: Choose a card type. Reveal the top card of your stack. If that card has the chosen type, draw it and gain 2[credit]. Otherwise, trash it.
title: Oracle May
